content:
america has spoken  Donald Trump will be a oneterm president PERIOD

At  a.m PERIOD on Saturday Nov PERIOD  the Associated Press AP called the state of Pennsylvania for former Vice President Joe Biden which put his total Electoral Votes at  and secures himthe presidency PERIOD

Both Biden and Trump have exceeded former President Barack Obamas record of70294341 votes in a presidential election  with75010459 votes so far forBidenand70686229 votes so far for Trump PERIOD

I pledge to be a president who seeks not to divide but unify who doesnt see red states and blue states only sees the United States said Biden in a victory speech Saturday night PERIOD He renewed his call to restore the soul of the nation and outlined his top priorities once taking office with an emphasis on hope unity healing and bipartisanship PERIOD

Current President Donald Trump has not conceded the presidency and has pledged to pursue a legal battle PERIOD

The Trump campaign put out a statement earlier today.The simple fact is that this election is far from over PERIOD Joe Biden has not been certified as the winner of any states let alone any of the highly contested states headed for mandatory recounts or states where our campaign has valid and legitimate legal challenges that could determine the ultimate victor they wrote PERIOD

Trump declared himself victorious early Wednesday morning and tweeted STOP THE COUNT numerous times on Nov PERIOD  PERIOD

Today at  a.m. the President tweeted I WON THIS ELECTION BY A LOT

Beginning Monday our campaign will start prosecuting our case in court to ensure election laws are fully upheld and the rightful winner is seated the Trump campaign wrote PERIOD

Additionally Sen PERIOD Kamala Harris made history as the first woman first Black person and first South Asian person ever elected as vice president PERIOD While I may be the first woman in this office I will not be the last PERIOD Because every little girl watching tonight sees that this is a country of possibilities she said tonight PERIOD

At the time of writing Biden has  electoral votes and Trump has  according to the AP PERIOD The states of North Carolina Alaska and Georgia have not yet been called PERIOD

Trump has not conceded the election and it is unclear if and when he will do so.Howeverconcession of the race is not required by the Constitution or any other document PERIOD

Biden received over  Electoral Votes making him the Presidentelect PERIOD

Let us be the nation that we know we can be PERIOD A nation united a nation strengthened a nation healed The United States of America Biden said PERIOD

Photo courtesy of the Associated Press PERIOD

The Student News Site of University of New Hampshire
